text.config.cherry-on-top.title: Cherry On Top Configuration
cherry-on-top.features.phantomSpawningRe: Replaces the vanilla phantom spawning rules with spawning rules based on player altitude.
Set Y height from which the game will attempt to spawn phantoms. The chance of a spawn attempt succeeding is 1 - (startHeight / currentPlayerHeight).
Amount of time in seconds between each phantom spawn attempt.
Maximum amount of seconds to be added to the base spawn frequency, ranging from 0 to bound - 1.
Phantoms will be unable to spawn when the player is holding any repellent item in their hand or offhand.
cherry-on-top.features.repelPhantomsWith: Items on this list will repel phantoms if held.
cherry-on-top.features.enchantmentUpgrad: Adds a new smithing template found in End Cities by default that can upgrade a single enchantment stored in a book by one. The selected enchantment depends on the amount of lapis added to the recipe. The template can be duplicated once found.
Upgrading costs experience based on the repair cost of the upgraded book.
The base XP level cost to be added on top of the repair cost of the upgraded book.
text.config.cherry-on-top.option.enchant: Only allow upgrading single enchanted books
cherry-on-top.features.enchantmentUpgrad: Only allow upgrading enchanted books which have only one stored enchantment.
The chance of the smithing template appearing in loot chests defined in the list below.
Loot tables on this list will have a chance to contain the smithing template.
cherry-on-top.tweaks.disableDoubleTapSpr: Disables double-tapping the forward key to sprint.
cherry-on-top.tweaks.playBowDrawingSound: Players and mobs will play bow drawing sounds to indicate that they're about to shoot.
cherry-on-top.tweaks.infinityMendingComp: Makes Infinity compatible with Mending, letting you craft a bow with both enchantments.
text.config.cherry-on-top.option.craftTi: Craft tipped arrows with regular potions
cherry-on-top.tweaks.craftTippedArrowsWi: Changes the tipped arrow crafting recipes to require regular potions instead of lingering ones.
cherry-on-top.tweaks.hideDebugInfoInSurv: Hides information relevant to gameplay from the F3 debug screen when in survival mode.
cherry-on-top.tweaks.riptideWorksOnlyInW: Makes Riptide work only when inside water and not in rain.
item.minecraft.cherry-on-top.smithing_te: Select enchantment to upgrade with Lapis Lazuli
